description.value:
Can collect, store, and sterilise up to 10 seperate material samples. has built in Auspex, Chrono, Glow-lamp, and compass. +5 to Awareness and Search Tests, +10 to Chem-Use and Trade(Chymist) Tests. Can fire sample as ranged attack. Wep Stats: Pistol; 5m; S/-/-; 1d5+2; Pen 0; Clip 1; Reload 2 Full. May have Toxic/Snare/Unstable dependent on Sample.

Requirements

Legally, limited to members of the Adeptus Mechanicus, requires relevent Mechadendrite Use Talent and Cyber-Mantle. May not have more Mechadendrites than Toughness Bonus

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
